metadata.dc:description: We report a case of mesenteric panniculitis that presented with a severe lost of weight. We stress the difficulty that entails the diagnosis of this unusual entity, and also the excellent response to corticoid therapy in our patient. The clinical, pathological and therapeutic features of mesenteric panniculitis are reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Severa pérdida de peso en el debut de una paniculitis mesentérica.
[Severe weight loss at the beginning of mesenteric panniculitis].
